name: Project Myriad
detailed_description:
Project Myriad is a tower defense strategy game. You place symbols on a map of hexagon tiles that will activate defense towers. These towers will attack waves of enemies. The goal is clear as many waves as possible. Once placed you can upgrade towers to provide more damage.
-18 Unique towers to choose from derived from 4 tower categories; Single Target, Line Targets, Area Damage, Support Towers.
-Select 7 towers at a time from 3 separate tiers for over 10,000 possible combinations.
-Each tower can be upgraded 4 times after being built.
-Try to find the best combination for any given level.
-Random mode selects towers for you for added challenge.
-Random mode ignores tier requirements giving over 1000 more combinations.
-Unlimited waves, see how far you can go!
